config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The 'enableAntiAliasing' configuration option is used to determine whether anti-aliasing should be applied to the scaled image. If the option is enabled, the scaled image will be filtered using the OP_ANTIALIAS filter.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The 'enableAntiAliasing' configuration option is triggered when the user interacts with the corresponding checkbox in the user interface. It is triggered during the loading of preferences in the 'loadPrefs' method.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: Enabling the 'enableAntiAliasing' configuration option will impact the quality of the scaled images by applying anti-aliasing. This can result in smoother edges and overall improved visual quality of the images.
